title: Train fault reported at Tiong Bahru

title_translations.zh-Hans: 樟宜铁路报告了列车故障
title_translations.ms: Aduan kerosakan kereta api di Tiong Bahru
title_translations.ta: Tiong Bahru இல் ரயில் கோளாறு தெரிவிக்கப்பட்டது

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #Bugis towards #JooKoon are now operating normally. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
[EWL] UPDATE: Estimate 10mins additional travel time from #Bugis towards #JooKoon due to train fault.
[EWL] UPDATE: Estimate 5 mins additional travel time from #Bugis towards #JooKoon due to train fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time from #TiongBahru to #JurongEast towards JooKoon due to train fault.
[EWL] A train fault has been reported at TiongBahru WB. Trains are moving slower towards Joo Koon.
